item.title: W10-S2 Applications of First-Order Differential Equations
item.description: 周次: 10 日期: April 29, 2022 节次: 2 In today’s lecture, we are going to look at three typical applications of first-order differential equations. Analyzes an object moving along a straight line while subject to a force opposing its motion. A model of population growth which takes into account factors in the environment placing limits on growth. A
